prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a tough female Saiyan warrior, short spiky black bob hair, wearing battle-damaged white Saiyan armor with shoulder pads over a reddish-pink bodysuit, confident ruthless expression
feature_prompt: battle-worn metal texture on armor, realistic spandex fabric weave, sweat on skin, defined athletic musculature, sharp gaze, subtle dirt and grit
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, cosplay, clean armor, doll, soft features, neon pink, makeup, lipstick, delicate
